attributes.action: Legislate to safeguard the Classified Football Results on the BBC each Saturday
attributes.additional_details: The Classified Results are a national institution and for the BBC to have removed them from the schedule without public consultation is massive own goal, which needs to be called out by the government and opposition.
attributes.background: Drive the BBC to reinstate the Classified Results at 1700 each Saturday, either through legislation or via routine budgetary negotiations.

rejection.details: Decisions about features on individual TV or radio programmes on BBC channels are a matter for the BBC, which is operationally independent of the UK Government. This means the Government is not directly responsible for the action this petition calls for.
